meanings.definition: Showing concern for the welfare of others; charitable.
meanings.sent1: Her philanthropic actions helped many people in need.
meanings.sent2: The philanthropic organization donated food to the homeless shelter.
meanings.sent3: The philanthropic gesture of giving away her toys made the children smile.
meanings.sent4: His philanthropic spirit shone brightly in the community.
meanings.sent5: The philanthropic act of planting trees will benefit the environment for years to come.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the practice of philanthropy.
meanings.sent1: The philanthropic event raised funds for the local hospital.
meanings.sent2: She received an award for her philanthropic efforts in the community.
meanings.sent3: The philanthropic bake sale was a sweet success.
meanings.sent4: His philanthropic mindset guided his business decisions.
meanings.sent5: The philanthropic campaign aimed to support education for underprivileged children.

meanings.definition: A person who seeks to promote the welfare of others, especially by the donation of money to good causes.
meanings.sent1: The philanthropic generously donated to various charities.
meanings.sent2: She was known in the community as a dedicated philanthropic.
meanings.sent3: The philanthropic's contributions made a significant impact on the community.
meanings.sent4: The philanthropic's kindness inspired others to give back.
meanings.sent5: Being a philanthropic brings joy through helping those in need.
